title: Settings
description: Configure your receipt processing preferences and AI model providers

categories.title: Category Management
categories.description: Create and manage custom categories to organize your receipts

providers.title: AI Model Providers
providers.description: Configure and monitor your AI model providers

apiKeys.title: API Key Configuration
apiKeys.description: Configure your API keys to enable additional AI model providers

openrouter.title: OpenRouter API Key
openrouter.description: Access multiple AI providers through OpenRouter's unified API

usage.title: Your Current Usage
usage.description: Track your subscription limits and usage in real-time

currency.title: Default Currency
currency.description: Set your default currency for receipts

processing.title: Processing Settings
processing.description: Configure how your receipts are processed after upload. Changes are saved automatically.
processing.aiVisionDescription: Mataresit uses advanced AI Vision technology for receipt processing, providing superior accuracy with support for larger images (up to 5MB). This method processes your receipts directly using AI models with vision capabilities, eliminating the need for traditional OCR processing.
processing.aiModelConfigDescription: Configure your preferred AI models for single and batch processing below. Different models offer various trade-offs between speed, accuracy, and cost.
processing.batchProcessingDescription: Configure how multiple receipts are processed during batch uploads, including subscription limits, concurrency, timeouts, and retry behavior.

aiProvider.title: AI Provider
aiProvider.description: Choose your preferred AI processing provider

processingMethod.title: Processing Method
processingMethod.description: Choose how receipts should be processed

batchLimits.title: Batch Upload Limits
batchLimits.description: Maximum number of receipts per batch upload

autoCategories.title: Auto-categorization
autoCategories.description: Automatically categorize receipts based on merchant and content

messages.resetDescription: This action will reset all processing settings to their default values. This cannot be undone.
